actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to require public disclosure by certain recipients of Federal funds of information required to be kept by such recipients as a condition of receiving such funds.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Provides, with specified exceptions, that recipients of the Federal funds, either by grant or other similar program, which are to be expended other than for the personal use of such recipient, shall permit any member of the public to make a reasonable inspection of any records pertaining to the disbursement.

titles.title: A bill to require public disclosure by certain recipients of Federal funds of information required to be kept by such recipients as a condition of receiving such funds.
